thread.title: LGBT film Banned at home in Kenya, welcomed at Cannes

title: LGBT film Banned at home in Kenya, welcomed at Cannes
text:
LGBT film Banned at home in Kenya, welcomed at Cannes 01:48
Kenyan film 'Rafiki', which is about two women falling in love, has had its premiere at Cannes Film Festival despite being banned by the country's censors at home. Jayson Mansaray reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Kenyan film 'Rafiki', which is about two women falling in love, has had its premiere at Cannes Film Festival despite being banned by the country's censors at home. Jayson Mansaray reports.
